articles.author: Laura Barton
articles.title: Arcade Fire: ‘America is rotten, but there are beautiful things about it’ - The Guardian
articles.description: After the high-concept hijinks around their last record turned off fans, the indie troubadours have gone back to basics with a rousing new album about Trump and togetherness
articles.content: Mid-morning in New Orleans, and outside an Uptown coffee shop, Win Butler is talking of life in his adopted city the basketball, brass bands, and the poisonous caterpillars of the buck moth that, in … [+13575 chars]

articles.title: CSIS flags issues with U.S. intelligence prior to Jan. 6 riot, says it faces the same problems - CBC News
articles.description: American intelligence agencies struggled with "inconsistencies" in their analysis and "a lack of consensus" on the nature of the threat in the weeks prior to the Jan. 6, 2021 riot on Capitol Hill, says an internal Canadian Security Intelligence Service (CSIS)…
